name: OnLevelSelect_14A
_source: speak;Narrator;Thanks to the arrival of reinforcements from Princess L'Arachel of Rausten,
speak;Narrator;Eirika and her allies successfully repel the Grado invaders.|Still, Jehanna Hall remains under siege, on the edge of ruin.
speak;Narrator;En route, Eirika learns that the hall has indeed been captured by Grado.
speak;Narrator;To rescue Queen Ismaire and recover Jehanna's Sacred Stone, Eirika leads an assault on the royal hall.
